name: UnionMarketingTips
0:
”Alexa open union”
”Alexa ask union for a tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: union
des:
Ask for marketing tips from the people who know.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Union" or "Alexa, open Union" to get a tip of the day".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
